src:
Hasil Pertandingan Bayern Munchen vs Olympiakos: Skor 2-0
07 Nov 2019, 02:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bayern Munchen sukses mengalahkan Olympiakos dengan skor 2-0 dalam laga matchday keempat fase grup Liga Champions 2019-20 yang digelar di Allianz Arena, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Usai bermain imbang tanpa gol sepanjang babak pertama, Bayern memastikan kemenangan berkat gol yang dicetak Robert Lewandowski dan Ivan Perisic.
Berkat hasil ini, Bayern makin kokoh di puncak klasemen Grup B dengan poin 12, sedangkan Olympiakos makin terpuruk di dasar klasemen dengan hanya mengoleksi satu poin.

Simak ulasan pertandingan selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Match Results Bayern Munich vs Olympiakos: Score 2-0
Nov 7 2019, 02:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bayern Munich successfully defeated Olympiakos by a score of 2-0 in the fourth matchday match of the 2019-20 Champions League group phase that was held at the Allianz Arena on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs.
After a goalless draw during the first half, Bayern sealed the victory thanks to goals from Robert Lewandowski and Ivan Perisic.
Thanks to these results, Bayern are getting stronger at the top of Group B with 12 points, while Olympiakos is getting worse at the bottom of the standings by only collecting one point.

Check out the full match review below.
